introText: Hello, I'm Pascal Huber. I'm a frontend developer from Lachen, Switzerland. Welcome to my portfolio page! Here, I share my journey in web development. I love creating user-friendly websites and attractive interfaces. My training and project experience has given me a solid foundation in frontend development. I'm excited to apply my skills to your company and contribute to your success.
trainingDescription: During my frontend developer training, I gained broad knowledge. I worked on various projects that improved my web development skills. In the portfolio section, you'll find some of these projects showcasing my abilities as a junior frontend developer.
juniorDeveloperContribution: With the expertise gained from my professional, project-based programming education, I am determined to tackle challenges head-on and transform them into valuable learning experiences.
frontendDevelopmentSkills: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different projects.
sampleOfWork: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
projectDescriptionJoin: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projectDescriptionElPolloLoco: A simple jump-and-run game using an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe gather salsa bottles to defend against the aggressive chicken.
projectDescriptionSimpleCRM: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.
projectDescriptionPokedex: Based on the PokeAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pok√©mon information.
contactFormText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
messageLengthError: Your message is empty or less than 20 characters
